title: Grilled Chicken and Mango Wraps
ingredients: 1/4 cup Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise
4 burrito size whole wheat tortillas or sandwich wraps
1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, grilled and thinly sliced*
instructions:
In small bowl, combine first 5 ingredients; set aside.
On tortillas, evenly layer remaining ingredients, then drizzle with mayonnaise mixture. Roll up and enjoy!
